c:attribute.name: metricsjobs
c:attribute.description: List of the active metrics reporting jobs.

c:method.name: StartMetricsJob
c:method.description: Start a job of the given name with the given parameters.

c:parameter.name: jobname
c:parameter.description: Name of the job to run.

c:parameter.name: periodMs
c:parameter.description: How often to get metric updates.

c:parameter.name: durationMs
c:parameter.description: How long to run the metrics.

c:parameter.name: metrics
c:parameter.description: Name fo the metrics to run, can be a regex to match multiple metrics.

c:method.name: EndMetricsJobs
c:method.description: Instructs the hub to cancel the name metrics reporting job.

c:parameter.name: jobname
c:parameter.description: Name of the job to stop stopping.

c:method.name: GetMetricsJobInfo
c:method.description: Get information about a running job.

c:parameter.name: jobname
c:parameter.description: Name of the job to fetch details about.

c:return.name: periodMs
c:return.description: How often to get metrics get updates.

c:return.name: remainingDurationMs
c:return.description: How much longer the job will run.

c:method.name: ListMetrics
c:method.description: List all of the current metrics..

c:parameter.name: regex
c:parameter.description: Name of the metrics to view.

c:return.name: metrics
c:return.description: The names of all metrics matching the regex.

c:method.name: GetStoredMetrics
c:method.description: Retrieves the metrics stored in the long term metrics store.

c:return.name: metrics
c:return.description: A gzip compressed and base64 encoded list<HubMetric>.
